assignments.name: Set_AI_status_to_not_used
assignments.label: Set AI status to not used

choices.name: choice_no_gong
choices.choiceText: Live meeting / not recorded on Gong

fields.name: Ai_running_header
fields.fieldText: Generative AI is analyzing this call. Please wait about 30 seconds for this to complete and then click Next

fields.name: AI_Still_runnnin
fields.fieldText: AI is still analyzing this call. Wait 10 more seconds and click Next.

validationRule.errorMessage: Next step date must be today or in the future

fields.name: Is_there_anything_else_related_to_this_product_conversation_you_want_to_share
fields.fieldText: Is there anything else related to this product conversation you want to share?

fields.name: Error_header_no_Definition
fields.fieldText:
Error - Product Conversation Definition not found:


Type: {!type}

Product: {!product}

Opportunity: {!recordId.Id}


Let Revenue Operations know if you get this error

fields.name: warning_existing_call
fields.fieldText:
Warning: A product conversation of type {!product} ({!type}) has already been logged against the selected Gong call by {!Look_for_existing_product_conversation.Owner__r.Full_Name_with_Role__c}.


Click here to open the existing conversation

fields.name: Analyze_this_Gong_call_using_AI
fields.fieldText: Analyze this Gong call using AI?

fields.name: call_footer
fields.fieldText: Note: Calls may take up to two hours to be processed by our systems and appear in the list above.

textTemplates.name: slack_notification
textTemplates.text:
:speech_balloon: New Conversation: {!new_conversation.Product__c} ({!new_conversation.Type__c}) logged by {!$User.Slack_Mention_Handle_Only__c}


Sales Owner: {!recordId.Account.Owner.Slack_Mention_With_Role_Full_Name__c}

Sales Engineer: {!se_null_safe}

TAM: {!tam_null_safe}

Account: {!recordId.Account.Account_Name_Compiled__c}

Segment: {!recordId.Segment__c}

Gong: {!gong_link}

Opportunity: {!new_conversation.Opportunity__r.Name}

Sentiment: [{!new_conversation.Sentiment__c}] {!new_conversation.Sentiment_Details__c}

Next Step: [{!new_conversation.Next_Step_Date__c}] {!new_conversation.Next_Step__c}
